page.title: 01BENTWORTH SUMMARY
page.content: Bentworth is a quiet village.It has a village hall,a primary school,2 pubs & a church.There were 3 pubs,the Star, the Sun & the Moon.The Moon was in Drury Lane but it is not there now. Farming.Bentworth has 7 farms,they are called Medstead Grange Farm,Wivelrod Farm,Childer Hill Farm,Wellers Place Farm,New Place Farm,Ashley Farm & Powells Farm.The school has a field & some swings.The school is 140 years old but the office is 93 years old. Population.There are 170 families living in our area of Bentworth. Our thanks to all the people of Bentworth who gave us so much help. We are:Terri,Lizzie,Jenny,Karen,Paul, Jo,Becca,Jason,Neil,Andrew,Jonathan, Sharon,Elizabeth,Sarah M.,Richard, Tricia,Jamie,Sarah W.,John,Dale,David, Simon,Nicky,Luke,Matthew & Mrs.Hunt.
